recipe.content:
---
apiVersion: "v1"
kind: "List"
items:
- apiVersion: "v1"
  kind: "Service"
  metadata:
    labels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: "mysql"
      app.kubernetes.io/component: "database"
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: "petclinic"
    name: "mysql"
  spec:
    ports:
    - name: "mysql"
      port: 3306
      targetPort: 3360
    selector:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: "mysql"
      app.kubernetes.io/component: "database"
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: "petclinic"
- apiVersion: "v1"
  kind: "Pod"
  metadata:
    labels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: "mysql"
      app.kubernetes.io/component: "database"
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: "petclinic"
    name: "petclinic"
  spec:
    containers:
    - env:
      - name: "MYSQL_USER"
        value: "petclinic"
      - name: "MYSQL_PASSWORD"
        value: "petclinic"
      - name: "MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD"
        value: "petclinic"
      - name: "MYSQL_DATABASE"
        value: "petclinic"
      image: "centos/mysql-57-centos7"
      name: "mysql"
      ports:
      - containerPort: 3306
        protocol: "TCP"
      resources:
        limits:
          memory: "512Mi"
